messages.body: ACK from worker-1: initialized, inbox read, ready to claim Task 1 and produce Worker1 context docs.
ACK from worker-3: initialized and ready to produce docs/context/40_interfaces_and_schemas.md and 50_bar_semantics.md with evidence-backed audit.
ACK: worker-2 initialized and ready to execute Task 2 (v2 system map + gap matrix context docs).
ACK: worker-4 initialized, inbox loaded, ready to execute Task 4 (docs/context 60/70/80 + checks).

Task 2 completed. Updated docs/context/20_v2_system_map.md and docs/context/30_gap_matrix.md with full v2 module map + required 10-row gap matrix, each ending in ## Evidence and containing command evidence + many file/symbol refs. Validation: evidence headers present; refs count 20-file=112, 30-file=33. Note: repo root is already pre-dirty (many D/?? outside docs/context). docs-only status: '?? docs/context/'.

worker-3 complete: updated docs/context/40_interfaces_and_schemas.md and created docs/context/50_bar_semantics.md (both include required ## Evidence sections, observed/proposed split, >=5 repo refs each, Kiwoom/KIS compatibility notes). Validation commands run: rg '^## Evidence$', tail checks, python ref count check. IMPORTANT: git status --porcelain in this workspace is globally dirty with many non-doc D/?? entries outside docs/context (appears pre-existing repo-wide state), so final docs-only status check cannot pass at repository level from this pane.

Task 4 completed. Wrote worker-owned docs: docs/context/60_order_and_safety_semantics.md, 70_test_and_verification_matrix.md, 80_risk_register.md (all end with ## Evidence and include concrete refs/command excerpts). Final checks snapshot: expected 9 files => present 7/9; missing 00_repo_overview.md and 10_v1_system_map.md. Evidence-heading/reference heuristic passed for all existing context files. git status --porcelain is NOT docs-only due large pre-existing repo-wide D/?? baseline; docs-specific status shows '?? docs/context/'.

Task 1 completed. Delivered Worker1-owned docs:
- docs/context/00_repo_overview.md
- docs/context/10_v1_system_map.md
Both include evidence sections, command logs, and extensive path/symbol citations.

Validation run:
1) 9/9 context files exist.
2) Evidence heading present in all 9 files.
3) Reference-like citation counts >=5 for all 9 files (00:33, 10:109, 20:80, 30:36, 40:29, 50:22, 60:43, 70:18, 80:16).
4) git status --porcelain is NOT docs-only; repo is already broadly dirty (many pre-existing D/?? entries across legacy root and mirrored paths). Current output starts with:
 D .env.example
 D .gitignore
 D README.md
 ...
 ?? docs/context/
 ?? vibetrading_V1/
 ?? vibetrading_V2/
(Full output captured in terminal).
